coded_answer.p: I am writing to you to thank you very much for the priceprize you're giving me. This is the first time ofin my life that I won anything like that. When I recivedreceived your latterletter, I could not belivebelieve it.

I am glad to replayreply to your latterletter. UnfortunatellyUnfortunately, I will be able to go onlyonly be able to go in July because the restaurant where I am working will be closed for thisthat datesmonth.
MyOn my last holiday in a tendtent I had a very bad experience, the mosquitosmosquitoes nearly killed me. I would prefer a log cabinslog cabin.

With reference to the activities, I have never been climbing. I would like to try this sport. I am a lover of riskdanger sports. I am a really good singer. I am enjoyingenjoy a lot with karaokeenjoy karaoke a lot.
I am in douptdoubt as to whichwhat kind of clothes I have to bring with me. And may I also ask you, how much money I have to take with me.

coded_answer.p: The company I work for, works for Los Svaves, it's. It's a very famous group from my country. Can you guess whewho they chossedchose for the workjob, "me", yes, me, I couldn't belivedbelieve it. At the moment just I went just to one concert.
